content: front when you drop the ivory yarn in this photo to switch to green drop the ivory by moving it toward the front of your work and pick up the green from the back this keeps the lines from getting crossed or wrapped around each other adding a new cake i like to use the russian join method to add new yarn https //youtu be/jcnkkouwaog si=4hcejlwfejz4x2nc share your project with #canyonmoonrising on instagram please feel free to sell finished items made from this pattern as long as you give design credit as canyon moon rising crochet pattern by pretty peaceful not for commercial use please do not share photos of this pattern only share the link to the pattern pdf on ravelry or etsy thank you for your support canyon moon rising crochet pattern © 2025 by susan kennedy of pretty peaceful
